package.name: lego_mcp_microros
package.description:
LEGO MCP micro-ROS Package
Provides micro-ROS agent configuration and ESP32 firmware templates for Alvik AGVs.
Features: - Micro-ROS agent launch and configuration - ESP32 firmware templates for Alvik - Serial/WiFi/UDP transport configuration - Message type definitions for embedded systems - Firmware build scripts and PlatformIO configuration
